title: Report: Google to announce new Nexus phones on September 29 | Trusted Reviews
description:
![Nexus 6
19](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Google is planning to reveal its long awaited new Nexus phones – the[Nexus
5X](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-nexus-5-2015-release-date-rumours-
news-specs-and-price) and [Nexus
6P](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/huawei-nexus-6-2015-release-date-
rumours-news-specs-price) – at an event in San Francisco later this month,
according to reports on Wednesday.**

CNET [sources](http://www.cnet.com/news/google-will-hold-nexus-smartphone-
event-on-sept-29-in-san-francisco/) say the handsets, likely to be
manufactured by LG and Huawei, will officially arrive on September 29.

The [LG Nexus phone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-
nexus-5-2015-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price) is likely to be a
replacement for the existing Nexus 5 handset, packing a 5.2-inch (1080p)
display, a 6-core Snapdragon 808 processor and a 12-megapixel camera.

Recent reports have also suggested it’ll pack 3GB of RAM, a fingerprint
scanner and Type-C USB connectivity.

In terms of [Huawei’s first Nexus
device](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/huawei-nexus-6-2015-release-date-
rumours-news-specs-price), that’s likely to pack a much larger 5.7-inch screen
and more of a flagship spec sheet, including a larger camera sensor.

The event is likely to see the official debut of the completed Android
Marshmallow operating system, which has been in preview since May.

New Nexus handsets always arrive with the new update out of the box, but it’ll
also trigger the roll out for older devices and others on the fast-track to
Marshmallow.  
 **  
See also:**[ **Android 6.0 Marshmallow features: What’s new?**  
](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-m-features)  
Today’s report adds weight to previous suggestions the phones might arrive on
September 29.

earlier models? Share your thoughts below.
